title: Todo App
description: A simple app to add, edit, and delete tasks. Helps users stay organized with task lists and deadlines.

title: Testimonials
description: A section to showcase user feedback and reviews with a carousel or card layout for better presentation.

title: Accordions
description: Interactive collapsible sections to organize content. Useful for FAQs or multi-step instructions.

title: Form Validation
description: Validates user inputs in real-time, checking for errors like empty fields, invalid emails, or password strength.

title: Calculator
description: A web-based calculator that performs basic arithmetic operations with a responsive UI.

title: Meal API
description: Fetches meal recipes from an API and displays ingredients, instructions, and images of dishes.

title: Product Filtering
description: Filters products based on categories, prices, or ratings, enhancing the shopping experience.
